snippet.title: NieR:Cogito -  Video Trailer For The Derivative Program About Machines
snippet.description:
NieR:Cogito is available to play now on Windows, Linux, Mac, and in-browser for free!
https://silverstitch.itch.io/cogito
= = = = =
This game is a Non-Commercial Derivative Work produced by Silver Stitch Productions for the NieR:Re[in]carnation Content Creator competition (August2021). This is not an official game, and is developed according to 'Guidelines concerning derivative works relating to the NieR series'* for the purposes of both the competition and entertainment.
= = = = =
NieR:Re[in]carnation:
Available to play on Android and Apple:
https://nierreincarnation.com/

NieR:Re[in]carnation Official Discord:
https://discord.gg/4QTuC6xR82
= = = = =
*'Guidelines concerning derivative works relating to the NieR series'
https://nierreincarnation.com/guidelines-relating-to-derivative-work/

The NieR series is produced and owned by Square Enix Co. Ltd.. This game is produced and owned by Silver Stitch Productions, and is not affiliated with Square Enix.
